ygData.subject: Re: weapon's for necro's
ygData.msgSnippet: Monks need this item for a quest as well, so there is a *little* competition for it :) ... From: Jeremy Van Grinsven  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Monks need this item for a quest as well, so there is a *little* competition
for it :)

----- Original Message -----
From: Jeremy Van Grinsven <jeremvan@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, May 31, 1999 2:57 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] weapon's for necro's


> From: "Jeremy Van Grinsven" <jeremvan@...>
>
> It is in befallen on a necro thruguist, about lvl 20. But you will not
get
> the necro one-on-one so a group is needed. The dagger can be purchased
cheep
> (10-15pp) because only necro can use it.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tony B <tonyb72@...>
> To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
> Date: Friday, May 28, 1999 10:24 PM
> Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] weapon's for necro's
>
>
> >From: "Tony B" <tonyb72@...>
> >
> >Dagger of Marnek
> >(magic)
> >Dmg:3
> >Dly:30
> >Effects: +3 int, +15 mana
> >necromancer only weapon.
> >can be stored in the thrown weapon slot.
> >
> >i bought it, but it is a rare find from Najena, and from what i hear it
is
> a
> >rather high level kill.
> >
> >belphenor
> >
> >
> >>From: "Mata" <mata_eq@...>
> >>
> >>I have seen it in LF, and that was a while ago, but a Ranger was w/ me
in
> >>lesser fay and the Named Wasp came up on his tracking, so I suspect that
> it
> >>only spawns every X hours real time and when it does it is probably
killed
> >>FAST by any "trackers" in the area, becuase they will be aware of its
> >>presence long before people who rely on sight.
> >>
> >>P.S. What are the stats on the magic dagger you bought? Is it possible
> to
> >>get it at 12th lvl ish?
> >>
> >>----- Original Message -----
> >>From: Tony B <tonyb72@...>
> >>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
> >>Sent: Friday, May 28, 1999 10:05 AM
> >>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] weapon's for necro's
> >>
> >>
> >> > From: "Tony B" <tonyb72@...>
> >> >
> >> > i just bought the dagger of marnek =) hehe, im so happy about it.
as
> a
> >> > main weapon im still using a giant snake fang tho, since the dagger
is
> >> > mainly good for the bonuses (and, of course, if i need a magic
weapon).
> >>the
> >> > great thing about it is i can keep it in a thrown slot. im pretty
sure
> >>i
> >> > got a really great deal on it too (25pp)
> >> > has anyone run across a crook stinger? i spent a week (real time) in
> >>lesser
> >> > faydark looking for a damn named wasp, but didnt find him. in fact,
a
> >>few
> >> > druids/rangers said they have been looking for it since after beta,
and
> >> > still havent seen it. perhaps it's gone?
> >> >
> >> > belphenor
> >> >
> >> >
> >> > >From: "James" <manickd@...>
> >> > >
> >> > >Ok I like to keep up on al my weapon skills so I am maxed out in 1hb
> >>and
> >> > >2hb
> >> > >and pircing. Now that I am level 13 what do I get for a good weapon.
I
> >>am
> >> > >told a totem staff is good. But its seem slow to me. If you could
tell
> >>me
> >> > >what you sugets and where I an get the weapon of your choice I would
> be
> >> > >thanksfull.
> >> > >
> >> > >
